title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti. Meanwhile, cook the beef with onions and garlic, add tomatoes, and simmer.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti. Meanwhile, cook the beef with onions and garlic, add tomatoes, and simmer.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A creamy Russian beef dish with mushrooms and onions, served over noodles or rice.
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in butter. Add beef strips and brown them. Add mushrooms, cook until soft. Stir in mustard and sour cream, simmer for a few minutes. Serve over rice or noodles.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomatoes, mozzarella, and fresh basil.
instructions: Roll out pizza dough and spread a layer of tomato slices. Top with mozzarella and fresh basil leaves. Drizzle olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Bake at 220°C (425°F) until crust is golden.

title: Vegetarian Chili
summary: A hearty vegetarian chili packed with beans, vegetables, and spices.
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper. Add tomatoes, kidney beans, and spices. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve with sour cream and shredded cheese, if desired.

title: Pad Thai
summary: Thai stir-fried noodles with tofu, peanuts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.
instructions: Cook noodles according to package instructions. Stir-fry tofu, then add garlic and eggs. Mix in noodles, tamarind sauce, and fish sauce. Garnish with peanuts and serve with lime wedges.

title: Lemon Garlic Salmon
summary: Baked salmon with a flavorful lemon garlic butter sauce.
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F). Place salmon on a baking tray. Mix melted butter, lemon juice, and minced garlic, then pour over the salmon. Bake for 15-20 minutes. Garnish with fresh parsley.
